summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SecureBank application. Frontend loads correctly but authentication integration has critical issues.

critical_bugs.issue: Demo user authentication failing - credentials mismatch between frontend display and backend database
critical_bugs.impact: Users cannot login with displayed demo credentials

critical_bugs.issue: Rate limiting blocking registration testing after multiple attempts

database_issues.issue: Database schema was not properly migrated initially

ui_bugs.issue: Demo credentials displayed on page (alice@demo.com/password123) do not work for authentication

integration_issues.issue: Frontend-backend authentication integration broken - login attempts fail with 401 Unauthorized

csp_violations.issue: Content Security Policy blocking external resources
csp_violations.impact: External fonts and services not loading

passed_tests: Marketing page displays correctly with proper navigation
Login page renders with form elements
User registration endpoint accepts requests (when not rate-limited)

success_percentage.backend: 30% - Health check works, but authentication fails
success_percentage.frontend: 70% - UI loads correctly but login integration broken

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix authentication integration - demo users shown on frontend (alice@demo.com/password123) are not working with backend login API. Either update backend to match frontend demo credentials or update frontend to show correct credentials. Also resolve CSP violations for external resources.
